title: Israeli cities face rioting, violence as Jewish-Arab conflicts intensify
content:
1. Israeli cities face rioting, violence as Jewish-Arab conflicts intensify  Fox News
  2. Palestinian and Jewish communities in violent clashes across Israel  Al Jazeera English
  3. Israel-Gaza: Planes diverted amid rocket threat  BBC News
  4. I grew up in a mixed Jewish-Arab city. Violence there frightens me more than rockets from Gaza.  JTA News - Jewish Telegraphic Agency
  5. I'm A Man Of Faith. But I Don't Know If I Believe Anymore That Peace Is Possible  WBUR
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
